Description: ESP LTD SC-608B Baritone Stephen Carpenter Signature Series Electric Guitar 8 String The ESP LTD SC-608B Stephen Carpenter Signature Series model is an 8-string baritone electric guitar that features a sleek, carved top solid alder body and maple neck-thru construction. Neck-thru construction ensures incredible strength and sustain from this throaty-voiced baritone monster. In addition to the sustain-rich mahogany and bright maple tonewoods, this ESP baritone guitar is packing two hot EMG-808 active pickups, the 8-string version of the EMG-85. A super solid Hipshot fixed bridge keeps everything aligned and makes the most of your string vibration for great sustain. The SC-608B neck features a fast U-shaped profile and an rosewood fingerboard with 24 extra jumbo frets, perfect for high-speed shredding. ESP locking tuners keep you spot-on tune, and black hardware completes the sinister look · Strings: 8· Body Type: M· Body Wood: Alder· Scale Length: 27"· Neck Joint: Neck-thru· Neck Wood: Maple· Fretboard: Rosewood· Neck Shape: Thin U· Frets: 24 extra-jumbo· Nut Width: 48mm· Bridge: Hipshot fixed bridge· Pickup Bridge: EMG 808· Pickup Neck: EMG 808· Controls: Vol / Tone· Tuners: ESP locking· Hardware color: Black· Pickup selector: 3-way selector
Title: ESP LTD SC-608B Baritone Stephen Carpenter Signature Series Electric Guitar 8
